name: Guard
note:
<enemy class: 41 />
===ANIMATION WHEN ENTERING BATTLE===
<action sequence: entry>
direction: user, down
move: subject, to home, 1
motion: subject, clear
</action sequence>

===ANIMATION WHEN PREPARING TO MOVE===
<action sequence: prepare> 
motion: subjects, wait
motion: subject, clear    
</action sequence> 

===ANIMATION WHEN MOVING====
<action sequence: movement>
if: action.isStepForward()
move: user, forward, 30, 48
else 
direction: user, down
move: user, to target, 12, -100 front
end
wait: user, move
motion: user, reset
</action sequence>   

===ANIMATION WHEN RETURNING====
<action sequence: return>
move: user, to home, 10
wait: user, move
motion: user, reset 
motion: subject, clear
</action sequence>     

===ANIMATION WHEN FINISHING ACTION===
<action sequence: finish>
wait: all targets, action
</action sequence>  

===ANIMATION ATTACKING===
<action sequence: execute>
wait: user, 15
icon: user, icon 653, 1, 26, -25, 255, 300
wait: user, 1
icon: user, icon 653, 1, 26, -23, 255, 320
wait: user, 1
icon: user, icon 653, 1, 26, -20, 255, 340
wait: user, 1
icon: user, icon 653, 1, 23, -20, 255, 360
wait: user, 1
icon: user, icon 653, 1, 20, -18, 255, 30
wait: user, 15
action: all targets, effect
wait: all targets, action
wait: user, 4
icon: user, clear, 1
</action sequence> 

===GETTING DAMAGED ANIMATION=====
<action sequence: damage>
motion: subject, damage
animation: subject, 139
move: subject, backward, 30, 24
wait: subject, move
wait: subject, 10
pose: subject, clear
move: subject, forward, 30, 24
wait: subject, move
motion: subject, reset
</action sequence> 

<letbs_sprite>
pose(idle): _idle, 3
pose(move): _move, 3
pose(atk): _atk, 3
pose(hit): _hit, 3
pose(dead): _dead, 1
turn_order: auto
status_sprite: auto
</letbs_sprite>

<letbs>
ai_pattern: melee_fighter
move_points: 6
turn_order: auto
sprite_scale: 1, 1
passable_on_death
</letbs>

<letbs_AI>
type: offense
</letbs_AI>
